title: Can't use mastery emote (ctrl+5) ingame
body:
On the OCE server I can't use the mastery emote on champs that I got to lvl 5 on 6.9. Everyone I have asked to use their emote ingame can't, have told me it doesn't work.


 I'm posting this on NA cause i think it might be a global issue.

replies.body:
Just saw an internal ticket get submitted about the emote thing this morning.  So far there's not any information as to what happened, but seems that it's occurring on all regions with 6.9.

If I hear more, I'll let you guys know. Until then, I suppose it's back to dancing on the fallen bodies of my enemies for me :3

FYI, champions that you don't have a mastery of 4 or 5 on when you try and use emote still come up with the message that you haven't unlocked it with that champ. With a champ that you have unlocked no message comes up, and mastery doesn't play.

I really hope it'll be back soon.
I already miss charging at the enemie team as a huge train, flashing the emote as I enter vision range...
And flash it again when my passive dies without achieving anything....
{{champion:14}}
Can't mastery emote either (NA) no one else on NA seem to be having this problem
i have the problem as well FeelsBad
I'm having the same problem as well.

Actually I forgot the original binding, I have it on Ctrl + ` (next to 1) cause it is easier to spam then from Ctrl 5 or Ctrl 6, has I use my "pinky palm" to press Ctrl so my little finger doesnt have to move off Q for very long. Also so i can spam Ctrl + 4,3,` to quickly laugh, dance, and emote.
From EUW here, doesnt work here either, looking for solutions.
It's not working for me neither, EuW server here.
Yep, doesn't work for me either, pls fix this fast
Same problem, mastery emote do not work at all and i tried like 100 times with diferent set. Fix it please. Euw
Ye, OCE here as well I wanna BM a bit :(
Its on ctrl 6 in general but for me it doesnt work either (EUNE). Riot please reply and fix it.
SAVE US RIOT!!!!!! NEED BUG FIX!!!!!!!

I don't like the fact that it's gone for now, but I think what's even worse is that the little thingy beneath your Champion Icon (mastery 4: brown, mastery 5:red) when you kill someone isnt't there either, since you don't have any opportunity to show your mastery with the Champion you're currently playing.
I want it back so badly... :3
